item.title: Overriding Default HTTP Resilience Handlers in .NET
item.description: While .NET 8's standard resilience handlers provide excellent defaults for HTTP clients, they lack built-in support for overriding these handlers for specific endpoints that require different resilience strategies. This article demonstrates how to implement a custom solution for overriding default handlers and discusses upcoming improvements planned by the .NET team. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/overriding-default-http-resilience-handlers-in-dotnet
